remarks: If ` A ` , ` B ` , and ` C ` fall in order on a line, and ` A B ` and ` A C ` are congruent, then ` C = B ` .  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 7-Oct-2013.)
statement: endofsegid $p |- ( ( N e. NN /\ ( A e. ( EE ` N ) /\ B e. ( EE ` N ) /\ C e. ( EE ` N ) ) ) -> ( ( B Btwn <. A , C >. /\ <. A , C >. Cgr <. A , B >. ) -> C = B ) ) $.
